tr.edu.gtu.cse241.hw7

Class AbstractBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • tr.edu.gtu.cse241.hw7.AbstractBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoardArray1D, BoardArray2D

    public abstract class AbstractBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class keeps some board informations.
    Author:
    Abdullah Celik

      • setSize

        public boolean setSize(int newRow,
                       int newColumn)
        Sets the board size to given values. The board is reset after this operation.
        Parameters:
        newRow - newRow should be greater than 3.
        newColumn - newColumn should be greater than 3.
        Returns:
        if setting is true, returns true. Otherwise returns false;

      • move

        public boolean move(char event)
        Makes a move according to the given char parameter. If the parameter is ‘L’ then the blank tiles moves left, ..., etc.
        Parameters:
        event - Event should be 'L','R','U','D'.
        Returns:
        if moving is true, returns true. Otherwise returns false;
